contents.text: Thank you for calling Vidado in the East Bay, the enterprise-grade solution for digitizing and enriching data at the scale and speed modern businesses demand.
For information on our digitization solutions, press 1.
To explore document and image digitization, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a document digitization specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and timeline for digitizing our archived legal files.
I need to digitize my military service records.
I need to discuss setting up a high-throughput document digitization workflow with OCR optimization.
I need help digitizing my old family photos and handwritten letters.
I need to digitize my handwritten physics lab notebooks and research diagrams.

contents.text: To learn about our data enrichment and AI services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a data enrichment specialist.

navigationGoals: Discuss AI-powered data enrichment solutions for our customer records.
I want to enrich and tag metadata on my scanned deployment logs.
I want to get details on your AI-driven data enrichment APIs and integration options.
I want to use your AI service to extract and organize text from my scanned documents.
I’d like to apply your AI enrichment to extract metadata from my scanned astrophysics graphs.

contents.text: For assistance with current projects and support, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve an API integration error with the document upload process.
I’m getting errors uploading my scans and need technical support.
I'm troubleshooting errors in the SDK integration and need technical support for debugging API calls.
I'm having trouble uploading my scanned files—can you help me troubleshoot?
I’m having OCR errors on my scanned circuit schematics and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing project, press 2.
Please hold while we check the status of your project.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my ongoing document digitization project.
I’d like a status update on my ongoing service record digitization project.
Please provide the latest status and ETA for my ongoing digitization project.
I'd like to check the status of my ongoing document digitization project.
I want an update on the status and timeline of my ongoing lab notebook digitization project.
